channel.title: Need $$$ via paypal - will be used for the funeral for my uncle
channel.description:
Well, i know that this isn't allowed here but just give me one chance for this because i loved my uncle so much and i wanna help with the funeral payments so i decided to give them atleast little amount of money for the funeral. I will give a little info for how my uncle died.
Date died: 9/22/2011 Reason why he died: Kidney Cancer Money that i want to give them: *Atleast $50 or less Are u sure this will be only once: Yes, just this :(
Okay so My paypal email will be [code]---[/code]
Any amounts will be accepted, after i've received atleast $25 I will throw a huge drop party on runescape because im quitting RS and will give away my RS account all skills 99 and 4 months membership left . So pls i really love my uncle i need atleast $25. Just this chance pls :(

item.title: Need $$$ via paypal - will be used for the funeral for my uncle
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

My condolences, but begging isn’t really allowed here.

Especially when you talk about a ‘runescape drop party’, and think that a funeral costs even close to $50.

Read full topic
